# diffuseAlbedoTextureFormat

**Instance Property**

The pixel format of the input diffuse albedo texture for the scaler you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var diffuseAlbedoTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat { get set }
```
